actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A concurrent resolution to uphold the separation of powers between the Executive and Legislative Branches of Government in the termination of treaties.

summary.text: Prohibits the President from taking any action that would affect the validity of certain post-World War II treaties, without the advice and consent of the Senate or approval of Congress.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to uphold the separation of powers between the Executive and Legislative Branches of Government in the termination of treaties.
